availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert W. Easley (Fulton County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Fulton County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Son of Benjamin Easley and Nancy Easley. Farmer in Fulton County in 1850. Signed a petition to Thomas Bramlette in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fulton County, p. 131A.
Find A Grave, "Robert W. Easley (1820-1881)," Memorial 162005836, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/162005836 (accessed February 7, 2020).
